sentences.en: Could you give me some indication as to when I am likely to receive a reply?
sentences.cn: 你能给我透露一下什么时候我能收到回复吗？

sentences.en: Did he give you any indication of his feelings?
sentences.cn: 他向你表示了自己的感情了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Electron micrographs give some indication here as is shown in Fig 3.12.
sentences.cn: 电子显微照片给出的一些说明示于图3.12中.

sentences.en: He searched Hill's impassive face for some indication that he understood.
sentences.cn: 他盯着希尔毫无表情的面孔，寻找着表明他已明白的些许迹象。

sentences.en: He swore in Spanish, another indication that he was rattled.
sentences.cn: 他用西班牙语破口大骂，这再次表明了他极为烦躁。

sentences.en: His actions for some weeks have given indication of queerness.
sentences.cn: 几个星期以来,他的行为有一些古怪.

sentences.en: His behavior gave every indication of an open affectionate heart.
sentences.cn: 他的行为就可以表明,他的心胸是坦荡的.

sentences.en: Hurstwood was too clever to give the slightest indication of a change.
sentences.cn: 赫斯渥非常机灵.他一点不动声色,不让人感到和以前有什么不一样.

sentences.en: I cannot come to a decision about it now or even give any indication of my own views.
sentences.cn: 现在我无法对此作出决定，甚至就连自己是什么观点也不能作任何暗示。

sentences.en: Indications are that the situation hasn’t improved much.
sentences.cn: 迹象表明局势并没有多大好转。

sentences.en: It also provides indication when direct risk is imminent.
sentences.cn: 危险临近时,它也能发出讯号.

sentences.en: Some indication of the range is given in Fig . 1.13 .
The indication given by a singal is known as the signal aspect.
sentences.cn: 信号所发出的灯色,称为信号方式.

sentences.en: There had been no indication of either breathlessness or any loss of mental faculties right until his death.
sentences.cn: 他去世前并未出现呼吸困难或意识不清的迹象。

sentences.en: There is every indication (= there are very clear signs ) that it is true.
There was only the faintest indication of a trail here.
sentences.cn: 踪迹到这儿只有蛛丝马迹可寻.

sentences.en: They gave no indication of how the work should be done.
sentences.cn: 他们根本没说明这项工作该怎样做。

sentences.en: Wouldn't a mere indication from my cousin clear up the misunderstanding? "
sentences.cn: 只要表姐有个表示,这误解不是就弄明白了? ”

words.tran_cn: 陈述语气；陈述语气的动词形式
指示器；[试剂] 指示剂；[计] 指示符；压力计

trans.tran_en: a sign, remark, event etc that shows what is happening, what someone is thinking or feeling, or what is true
